title: Putranjiva roxburghii
Chemical Constituents: terpenoids, mustard oils, flavonoids, tannins, alkaloids
Therapeutic uses: antiinflammatory, anti-oxidant, anti-microbial, anti-nociceptive, anti-pyretic, anti-emetic, cytotoxic, hypoglycemic, larvicidal, cytogenetic toxicity, aphrodisiac, anthelmintic, radioprotective, CNS depressant
